description: Partner Barry Howard trains new hire Cody Foster in the 'Basic Plumbers' policy in the warehouse by a van. Cody, a compact brick house, has one of the juiciest, roundest butts in the business and it gets quite the workout as Sean Davis returns to join the 69ing duo. Sean stuffs his immense rod into Cody's eminently fuckable behind.
title: Basic Plumbing, Scene #02
